title: The Loreley's Grasp (1974) -CLAN-SUD-
description:
In this brutal horror movie a ferocious beast murders unsuspecting young women near the river bank of a small German town. The monster always plucks the heart from the body of its prey, and it&#039;s not long before an expert hunter is sent to track down and kill the deadly creature.

Director Amando de Ossorio (Euro Fiends from Beyond the Grave) pours lashings of gore onto the screen as Loreley&#039;s Grasp builds towards its violent final act.
